title: Jessica Chastain, Chris Pine to Lead MeToo Drama 'This Is Pleasure'
desc: Adapted from Mary Gaitskill's novella and launching at the EFM, 'This Is Pleasure' is being directed by Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini.

title: New genetic tools offer more accurate breast cancer prediction for women of African ancestry
desc: Researchers at the University of Chicago Medicine have developed a set of polygenic risk score (PRS) models that significantly improved the ability to predict breast cancer risk in women of African ancestry. Using genetic data from more than 36,000 women, the team created the most comprehensive breast cancer prediction tool for this historically underserved population.

title: EvolveHQ earns ACTD accreditation, aligning its Tech & AI Training with international standards
desc: EvolveHQ, a Nigeria-based leading EdTech academy focused on developing globally competitive tech talent, has earned accreditation from the American Council of Training and Development (ACTD), a U.S.-based professional body that sets standards for workforce training and professional development.
